title: Snail Race UI in Figma
p: Assessing the ability to design visually appealing and modern screens in accordance with current design trends. The evaluation criteria strictly focus on the visual aspects.

title: Store APP
p: Discover a seamless shopping experience at our React-powered store. Made with technologies as Redux, Strapi CMS, and Stripe integration. Designed with SCSS, enhances your journey. Shop now and indulge in a world of unique products.

title: AI Background Removal with Cloudinary
p: Introducing a small project that harnesses the power of Cloudinary to effortlessly remove backgrounds from images. With the AI powered Cloudinary's advanced image processing capabilities do the work for you.

title: ReactJS Memory Game
p: Test your memory and have fun while matching pairs of cards featuring delightful images. Built with ReactJS, this interactive game offers an engaging and challenging experience for players of all ages.

title: ReactJS Meme Generator
p: Meme Generator project built with ReactJS and JavaScript. Unleash your creativity and sense of humor as you effortlessly create hilarious memes in just a few clicks. Add custom captions, this project empowers you to express yourself and share the laughter with friends and family.
